QuestData.Title: Chen and Li Li
QuestData.Description: My niece and I are new to Pandaria. Probably like yourself. We're visitors from the Wandering Isle, and, to be honest, we have no idea where we're going.$b$bThat farm up ahead looks as fine a place as any to take off our shoes and enjoy a brew. What do you say, Li Li?$b$b$R? Would you like to share the road with us?
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Chen Stormstout to Pang's Stead.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome, welcome, visitors! You've come to sample some of my son's turnips? Perhaps purchase a few pigs?$b$bPlease, make yourselves at home. I have plenty of room.

Objectives.Objective: Follow Chen and Li Li to Pang's Stead
